cause.description:
on you tube there is a clip called dolphin massacre in japan they catch thousands of dolphins and brutally slit their throats wirth macheties and leave them to die a painful death because they believe the more the dolphin suffers the more juicy the meat!its discusting and cruel i believe that those poor animals dont deserve that treatment please help me do something about this!!!!!!
1. dolphins dont deserve the knife
cause.mission: stop the japanese from brutaly slaughtering dolphins for meat
cause.name: rescue dolphins in japan
